title: I believe I was wrongly banned, and deserve one more chance. (Riot please read.)
body:
Recently my account was banned for showing toxic fortifications ingame. I am still bamboozled to why this has happened, and even looking at my chat logs there was only a few things wrong. I was playing as ADC, and was having a good time playing until we were losing and my teammate Yasuo tells me to go "Kill myself". Now, for myself, this was quiet saddening for myself and made me angry. The sad thing is the Yasuo told everyone to report me and they did, so now I have a full lobby reporting me because of my comments after being told to kill myself. I'll even post my chat log, but since Riot does not provide the full logs you can only see what I was banned for and not the game.

0:55] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): rekt
[1:16] XXHavana (Sivir): watch you get invaded by elise
[1:20] XXHavana (Sivir): and die lvl 2 at red
[1:28] XXHavana (Sivir): pffftt ahhaahah
[5:06] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): cmon baby
[7:54] XXHavana (Sivir): do drag soon
[8:13] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): "OMG THATS SO BM"
[10:15] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): sup home boy
[11:17] XXHavana (Sivir): dont hit it
[12:38] XXHavana (Sivir): yah okay
[12:44] XXHavana (Sivir): give the twitch 2 kills
[12:49] XXHavava (Sivir): lol
[14:38] XXHavana (Sivir): cause I do dmg
[16:20] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): rofl so sad
[16:48] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): still sad
[16:56] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): I'm enjoying this win
[17:06] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): rofl
[17:21] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): you have no way of winning
[20:07] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): THAT WASNT A SILENCE LOL
[21:07] XXHavana (Sivir): finally
[21:15] XXHavana (Sivir): a support who understands blue side mechanics
[23:48] XXHavana (Sivir): lets run into their jg
[23:50] XXHavana (Sivir): and 3v5
[23:53] XXHavana (Sivir): yeah nice
[24:04] XXHavana (Sivir): just don't say another word
[24:05] XXHavana (Sivir): please
[24:58] XXHavana (Sivir): there we go
[25:00] XXHavana (Sivir): keep going
[25:05] XXHavana (Sivir): idc either
[25:12] XXHavana (Sivir): you're theo ne been a %%%%
[25:21] XXHavana (Sivir): yas i
[25:23] XXHavana (Sivir): its you
[25:51] XXHavana (Sivir): you are though
[25:59] XXHavana (Sivir): grats
[26:11] XXHavana (Sivir): ahahahha
[28:24] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): you are so cool
[28:43] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): what joke
[29:01] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): dunno what you are on about
[29:24] XXHavana (Sivir): yeah keep csing bot
[31:06] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): You told me to go kill myself?
[31:17] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): wtf
[31:20] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): you told me to go kms
[31:22] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): reporting you
[31:31] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): so dog
[32:02] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): yeah gg
[32:09] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): I havent 1v1ed him at all
[32:25] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): Idc if we lose only care if you get banned now
[32:27] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): pls report yas
[32:43] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): >my cs though
[32:51] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): and its not negiative either
[33:25] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): nasus like to farm
[33:32] XXHavana (Sivir): ahahhaah
[33:44] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): nasus still going
[33:56] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): this yas
[33:57] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): omg
[34:03] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): ahahahha

There are only one to two hiccups I see in these logs. I get told to kill myself and I'm banned?

replies.body:
Hi XXHavana,

Can you post the full URL to your reform card that you received via email?

There are 12 lines of chat missing from this log. If you want to give me permission I can go ahead and share them for you.

To answer you directly you were being abusive towards your team in multiple instances. This kind of behaviour is something the community actively rejects.

Your ban should not come as a surprise.  You have been chat restricted multiple times in the past as well as receiving a temporary ban before this so you really should have reformed your behaviour before now.

I was chat restricted and banned beforehand of the times that when the reform system wasn't really in tact. And for one also, the chatlogs are the same that are received. I still don't understand why you are holding this back for so long, I've obviously had my banning handed out wrong to me and you don't want to post the full extended version of the game to why I was toxic. Do you think you would be happy if someone told you to go kill yourself in League? Surely not. Go look at the full game - everyone was toxic in it, and I'm the one to feel the burdens of it because my behaviours beforehand. I should at least deserve one more chance, and knowing to spend a good amount of time on this game as well as having a shortlist, you would think that I wouldn't do this again? Toxicity will only come naturally to people who are trolls, annoying and abusive. I was abused, I retaliated back, sure, but I did the wrong thing and now I receive a permanent ban. Go look at Dunkeys league video, I'm literally the same boat.

> [{quoted}](name=XXHavana,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IEJrrcbU,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-19T11:03:52.693+0000)
>
> I was chat restricted and banned beforehand of the times that when the reform system wasn't really in tact. And for one also, the chatlogs are the same that are received. I still don't understand why you are holding this back for so long, I've obviously had my banning handed out wrong to me and you don't want to post the full extended version of the game to why I was toxic. 

Here's the missing lines:

[12:49] XXHavana (Sivir): greedy pig
[12:55] XXHavana (Sivir): tp nasus
[14:28] XXHavana (Sivir): fuck yah

[16:56] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): I'm enjoying this free win  

[23:42] XXHavana (Sivir): fuck you guys are retarded

[24:09] XXHavana (Sivir): I'm getting cancer from you
[24:34] XXHavana (Sivir): god I hope we lose this game now

[30:43] XXHavana (Sivir): I have never seen
[30:45] XXHavana (Sivir): a worser yasuo
[30:46] XXHavana (Sivir): in my life

[33:29] XXHavana (Sivir): rofl enjoy your loss

The previous chatlog for your temporary ban also included lots of verbal abuse and harassment, including inappropriate language and suicide encouragement.

To be clear your ban will not be overturned.

Go Sephyre!

> The previous chatlog for your temporary ban also included lots of verbal abuse and harassment, including inappropriate language and suicide encouragement.

Can you post them too please?
I think for private records this is not allowed, unless of course XXhavana allows it.
Except my comment was in reply to Sephyre posting chat logs without OP's permission.
Good to see our rioters are still willing to kick these toxic assholes asses.
*Bans you*

And aswell, I get banned for getting baited and sucide encouragement. Maybe I should just do it and blame it on yous? I'm not going to get my atar needed for Uni so what's the point anymore. I'm only asking fit remorse from someone who likes playing league, yet you won't give me one last chance. Sure I've been banned before but everyone has bad days and its my turn. Thanks.
Calm down kid. You're toxic AF. Enjoy the ban ;D

How long is this ban for?
If I'm allowed to know.
It's a perma ban. He's already faced his 14 day ban and chat restrictions and remained toxic, hence he has now been perma banned.
But i've never gotten 14 day ban or chat restrictions and i got perma banned 4 nothing

In your case then I would bring it up with support. You shouldn't get perm banned with no previous warnings unless you get caught with something like scripting/hacking.

For behaviour bans you should always get two seperate chat restrictions and a 14 day before perma (as I understand it).

And my ban comes as a surprise due to the nature of the game. No one was listening to me the whole game, and Yasuo tells me to kill myself. This is getting into criminal activity for fuck sakes. I'll screenshot and post the chatlogs received from the e-mail if you want me to.
I've also got screenshot logs here; http://imgur.com/a/3vOBN
This is what I received, that's what I posted.
right after you edited it, you silly toxic sausage you

toxic sausage
toxic sausage
toxic sausage
toxic sausage is now a thing
From the looks of things, this may be a legitwrong ban. I've been told to go kill myself multiple times in games and **nothing is done about it**

Firstly, OP has been proven wrong so many times it's ridiculous, even by a Rioter. Hell, someone even proved that they had edited the images they posted.

Secondly, you have no way of knowing if another player got punished, so how the f*ck do you know nothing is done about it? Answer me that. As long as you report people when they should be then there should be no problem. The system and Rioters take death threats and suicide encouragement pretty seriously, so if people get reported for it then they will be getting punished, but it doesn't help if they don't get reported.

Wait so you've been temp banned before and chat restricted and yet you still chose to be toxic. And you're surprised that you're banned now? Idc what you're reasoning is, if someone is talking trash to you then mute and report them, stooping to their level is just pointless and from what the chatlogs show you started out being pretty negative anyway.  I think you've had enough chances. Kudos to riot for banning toxic people. {{summoner:1}}

don't take your fight into all chat, you are less likely to be banned if you don't

(and personally im glad you were banned, way you treated me for no reason (totally uncalled for (idc if I stole blue every time, its what I do)) when I got paired against you in a game, the way you "said" yasuo was treating you, you did to me, but unlike you, I seem to know where the mute button is)

You photoshopped your "proof". Why is there 4-6 minutes in between each screen shot and multiple errors in pixels?
LoL

Looks like your ban was justified. There's a fine line between a little banter, and what I'm seeing in your log (of which you apparently left out some lines).

Honestly, I can't believe people still use the "you'd do the same in my shoes" excuse. I think the break you've wholeheartedly earned should be used to reflect on yourself and your actions. I mean, yeah, maybe Yas did tell you to go kill yourself but why did you react? Two wrongs don't make a right. There was no need for you to continue chatting in game at all, if it really offended you then the best course of action would be to mute him and report after the game had finished.

The other thing that's got me confused is why you only seem to pick up on "one to two" hiccups. Even if your chat log is out of context half of the stuff you're saying is just not on at all anyway.

I'll provide a quick breakdown for you in words you should be able to understand.



**** [23:48] XXHavana (Sivir): lets run into their jg****
****[23:50] XXHavana (Sivir): and 3v5****
**** [23:53] XXHavana (Sivir): yeah nice****

Is this the only way you can express yourself? You could have worded this in a much more constructive manner. Instead you chose to come off as sarcastic and snarky. How could you have changed this? 



****[23:48] XXHavana (Sivir): that might have been a misplay running into their jungle, we should try to play a little more cautiously in future.****

Again, this is merely a suggestion. However, do try it. 



****[16:20] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): rofl so sad****
****[16:48] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): still sad****
****[16:56] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): I'm enjoying this win****
****[17:06] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): rofl****
****[17:21] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): you have no way of winning****

At what point did you stop and think this was necessary? Again, if you were spouting this garbage in one of my games you'd be instantly muted. This is the sort of stuff that's completely unnecessary and shows nothing but poor character.



****[33:56] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): this yas****
****[33:57] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): omg****
****[34:03] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): ahahahha****

Should have just muted Yas and focused on your game.



 ****[32:25] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): Idc if we lose only care if you get banned now
 [32:27] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): pls report yas****

Was this really necessary to say? If you care so much about someone else getting banned, despite the fact you've been just as bad as they have, then you really must reflect on yourself as a person. There's also no need to all-chat asking for a report. Most of the time it's essentially hearsay and the enemy has no real knowledge of what's going on. If in this case Yas was being toxic in all-chat then naturally he'd receive reports if the people were so inclined to do it. 


Anyway, enjoy your break. Try to take some time out to unwind and come back to the Rift with a new perspective assuming you weren't perma-banned.


TL:DR? If you really think you deserve a second chance you wouldn't even be trying to take the easy way out.

Look at the logs again. If only the whole extent of the game could be posted, and yet you have to pull out the affinities and show them. What you don't understand is that the only evidence of the game is the chat-logs from my POV, not my four teammates. You don't get to see what they are saying, and even if I mute, they continue to ping and spam me for my wrongdoings? Sure, I got cocky and banter, but people took it as a laugh which I considered banter. Yasuo was trolling, and played it in the Jungle. Under what circumstances of a Platinum elo do you think that is correct? Anyone would be toxic at him for that, and they were.

I'm not saying Yas wasn't in the wrong but you can't let other people get to you. That's the message I'm trying to get across... What is it that people always say? "You can't control your teammates but you can control yourself."

~~Thank you for not immediately interpreting my post as being aggressive towards you, maybe there is more to it than is being shown but in your initial post you didn't do much to substantiate your case.~~ - No longer relevant due to the closer inspection of the screenshots you provided.

At any rate, you should try your best not to let anyone else get to you. I know it can be hard sometimes especially when they're spamming pings at you (I've had that done to me countless times before and it is really annoying), but that's why they do it; to get a reaction. 

Also, could you explain [this](https://imgur.com/AlyS771) to me? I'm not sure how Riot deals with the logs but I'd imagine it would be a straight copy/paste so it was still in text. Yet, on closer inspection I've noticed a discrepancy. There's also a rather big gap of fifty-three seconds between those messages. Yet, in the logs you're constantly typing in all-chat.

use mute

(you deserve the ban btw, you did something like this (worse) to me because I stole your blue every time in a game)
Turn a blind eye hope problem will go away ? Rofl

> [32:25] [All] XXHavana (Sivir): Idc if we lose only care if you get banned now

The ban is justified, filth like you are ruining this game.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=IEJrrcbU,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-19T08:30:43.797+0000)
>
> The ban is justified, filth like you are ruining this game.

Idk bout you but i'd want this person being banned for telling another to go kill themselves.
At what point do you think its fair to tell someone to kill themselves, and not have them react?
Honestly, i dont see why yas wasnt banned also, they wanna restrict toxicity, yet they ban the defenders not the attackers, 
Reign of the troll lives on

> Honestly, i dont see why yas wasnt banned also

So tell us all how you KNOW the Yas wasn't also punished?
Well, i'd like to know
**THANKYOU.**

I wouldn't be surprised if you left something out, and I wouldn't be surprised if you've done much worse in other games. Without context there's no way to figure out what all of your comments are truly about.

If you've been banned, it's for good reason and Riot isn't going to lift it. Even with a full lobby reporting you it wouldn't increase the severity of your punishment.
That still doesn't amount to the fact that I'm banned for being told to kill myself. Anyone would have my behavior if they got told that.

You have no way of knowing the Yas wasn't banned as well, when riot looks at a report they see the whole game chat/stats, they just do not provide it in the feedback, they would have seen his comments as well. As for what you've given here, even assuming you took nothing out, does riot provide the whole log (of your chat) or only the lines they deem problematic? Because if it's the former then...pretty much everything you said that game was negative/toxic. If it's the latter that's not as bad but...that's still a lot of negativity even for a 34+ min game... and you were obviously negative from as early as 1:16....Not excusing the Yas but, two wrongs don't make a right.

i.e you weren't banned for being told to go kill yourself, you were banned just for being toxic in general
Ughhhhhh. People don't understand this point enough. I was banned wrongly, and even If I was toxic maybe I should earn another chance.

> I was banned wrongly

The chances of that being the case is negligible, at best.

> even If I was toxic maybe I should earn another chance.

But then Riot would have to give every toxic player another chance and you know what that means? People like you, and the Yas, would be allowed to run rampart even more before being punished as you have.

You are not even getting to the point properly. Go look at my screenshots and you will see. And do you really - really think that I would run rampart after this? It was a bad game, people have them, but Riot punishes me.

> Riot punishes me.

Yeh, because you were being toxic. Get that through your thick skull and stop trying to worm your way out of a deserved punishment.
What deserved punishment? Look at the screens if you don't believe me. I'm not going to sit here and argue over someone who isn't Riot.

> Look at the screens if you don't believe me. 

If you seriously think I'm going to believe you over a Rioter then think again. You don't get banned for "light banter".
You aren't even involved in this and you don't want to believe evidence over assumptions.

...All the evidence points to your obvious and REPEATED toxicity. Perma ban is FOURTH serious offense for one. And you keep going on about how the Yas was worse and that somehow get's you off the hook. If some kid steals a bike, and some other kid steals a car, the kid stealing the bike doesn't get off scott free just because the other kid did something worse, the one stealing the car simply gets a worse punishment. To say you should not be punished for YOUR OWN actions, because it's somehow magically someone worse's fault is a completely puerile and asinine way of looking at it. 

If it was one or two games it wouldn't be a problem, you wouldn't be banned, you wouldn't have even made it on chat restriction. The system is lenient enough as it is that only the serious repeat offenders ever make it to perma bans as in you have to be excessively toxic consistently. I don't think Riot even can undo perma bans even if they wanted to so all you're doing by publicising this is showing how toxic you are to everyone on the boards. If you really want to keep playing grow up and make a new account, but if you intend to stay toxic expect it to get banned pretty quick.

What evidence? The screenshots? Last I checked, that wasn't evidence. For one thing that doesn't even show what you said between 12:55 and 14:38, why is that I wonder? Not to mention, you could've done anything to those images before uploading them. You could've edited them to omit certain lines of text and make it look like Riot misinformed you and/or that you didn't say something you did.

Not to mention, Sephyre has asked for permission to post the 12 lines of chat you omitted and still has not received it from you, so what do you think that makes it look like? If you've got nothing to hide there's no problem giving permission, right?

> That still doesn't amount to the fact that I'm banned for being told to kill myself.

No, you were banned for toxic behaviour. What other people did doesn't come into it, only your actions do.

> Anyone would have my behavior if they got told that.

No, only toxic people like you would act in such a manner. You know what I do when someone tells me to kill myself over the internet? I report them. Then I ignore them. It's not hard. Maybe it's time you give up that "I'm a victim" mentality, two wrongs don't make a right.

There is a lot of riot can do no wrong on these forums. Riot forgets that their players are human. Every aspect of human emotion they have bundled into one toxic label and punish everyone for it. This is obviously a case of retaliation, was he banned because he hurt yasuo's feelings? maybe yasuo shouldn't have been a dick in the first place.

There is both ends of the spectrum and everything in between as far as support of riot is concerned on these forums, it's just a matter of who speaks the loudest in the end, but I think you're missing an important point. He was banned for being negative/toxic, and you don't get banned for a first offence. He was in no way banned for the Yasuo's actions, and we have no way of knowing if the Yas was also banned, since riot would have seen the whole game log, they would have seen the Yas's behaviour as well and punished him accordingly. I'm not saying the system is perfect, far from it, but this game and those logs had visibility in this guys punishment, which means the Yas was seen as well. 

This whole post is based under the assumption that his toxicity was the Yas's fault and that the Yas received no punishment, the former being untrue and the latter being an unknown but also likely false.

(And an actual rioter looks at logs when considering perma bans so it wasn't just a case of the automated system catching his and missing the Yas's behaviour.)
Let this one die now yea?
